sql.query: UPDATE submission_files sf, genres g, submissions s SET sf.genre_id = g.genre_id WHERE sf.genre_id = 1 AND g.entry_key = 'SUBMISSION' AND g.context_id = s.context_id AND s.submission_id = sf.submission_id

UPDATE submission_files SET genre_id = g.genre_id FROM genres g, submissions s WHERE submission_files.genre_id = 1 AND g.entry_key = 'SUBMISSION' AND g.context_id = s.context_id AND s.submission_id = submission_files.submission_id
UPDATE filter_groups SET input_type = 'class::classes.submission.Submission' WHERE symbolic = 'article=>doaj-json'
UPDATE journal_settings SET setting_name = 'citationsEnabledSubmission' WHERE setting_name = 'referencesEnabledSubmission'
UPDATE journal_settings SET setting_name = 'citationsEnabledWorkflow' WHERE setting_name = 'referencesEnabledWorkflow'
UPDATE journal_settings SET setting_name = 'citationsRequired' WHERE setting_name = 'referencesRequired'
